summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 30W, Page 91 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located within the I-5 right of way east of Franklin Avenue East, south of East Newton Avenue, west of Lakeview Boulevard East and north of East Galer Street from Residential, Multi-Family, Lowrise 2 (L-2) and Residential, Multi-Family, Lowrise 3 (L-3) to Manufacturing (M), and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of William L. Schallert, Jr.; C.F. 293057).
